snippet: Local officials and descendants of the warring clans seek to turn folklore into a source of jobs and revenue for Eastern Kentucky and West Virginia.
abstract: Descendants of those involved in famous Hatfield-McCoy feud are working together to promote tourism in the Eastern Kentucky and West Virginia region; families hope to turn folklore into source of revenue by luring tourists eager to learn about history of the 19th-century interfamily war fought over land and honor.
lead_paragraph: Local officials and descendants of the warring clans seek to turn folklore into a source of jobs and revenue for Eastern Kentucky and West Virginia.

headline.seo: Feud Tourism in the Land of Hatfields and McCoys
headline.main: Seeking to Lure Tourists to a Rugged Outpost Famed for a Deadly Feud
headline.print_headline: Seeking to Lure Tourists To a Rugged Outpost Famed for a Deadly Feud
